spawn.comment: Optional platform command to run after the Digger server starts. Most useful is to open the Digger URL in the default browser. In the args, DIGGERURL is replaced with http://localhost:6980 or whatever the port is set to.

darwin.comment: MacOS supports opening a URL via open.

win32.comment: Windows supports opening a URL via start.

linux.comment: Linux supports opening a URL via xdg-open.
